body: A percentage of people are doing on Avicus. I was with a player on avicus who has been getting shit talk behind his back. I don't fucken care how it happened. Stop before you kill some one. I will be happy watching you rot in jail.  The player nearly commited suicide. I hope moderators take it into their hands to control this.

title: Cyberbullying.

replies.body:
Bullying is not tolerated on Avicus.
Report the players next time. 
If no-one reports players who are harassing others, nothing can be done.
replies.body_tagged:
Bullying is not tolerated on Avicus.
Report the players next time. 
If no-one reports players who are harassing others, nothing can be done.

replies.body: If its that Out of Control we need to stop it ill talk to some close staff friends about this hope they can do something but bullying may be one thing we HAVE to live with - Jess
replies.body_tagged: If its that Out of Control we need to stop it ill talk to some close staff friends about this hope they can do something but bullying may be one thing we HAVE to live with - Jess

replies.body: Is another one of these posts necessary. Consider the people who are on the forums and compare them to the in-game population. Pretty much all of the people that do this aren't on the forums. Also is the language necessary. You can convey the same message without the language. /report is your best bet and online reporting is your best. I'm also afraid to say that this is the internet and you have to be able to ignore such messages or not take it personally. But this behaviour is still un-tolerable and should be reported.
replies.body_tagged: Is another one of these posts necessary. Consider the people who are on the forums and compare them to the in-game population. Pretty much all of the people that do this aren't on the forums. Also is the language necessary. You can convey the same message without the language. /report is your best bet and online reporting is your best. I'm also afraid to say that this is the internet and you have to be able to ignore such messages or not take it personally. But this behaviour is still un-tolerable and should be reported.

As for bullying we punish and do the best we can to stop it. Moderators aren't available to be on all the time the best thing you can do use /Report or file one online.

replies.body:
When you report you're incognito..
I honestly don't see the problem in reporting friends
replies.body_tagged:
When you report you're incognito..

replies.body:
Basically people are going to stir up shite with them b/c they reported them, because it was weak or they were (to use lighter language) being a "wimp" or whatever. People will only laugh, "can you believe they reported me?!?? Lmao, they need to chill". That generates hate from the people who see this so-called " sign of weakness" and they will take advantage of that and they will show no mercy. The thing that really gets me is I know some staff trash talk on TS, but I'd only get hated on for reporting them. And I know that there's been s**t talked behind my back, I care less than the average person I'd say, but most people are really affected by this. How would you feel if I was to spread an awful rumour about any of you reading this? You'd probably feel pretty bad, so please consider others first. 

Add-on: and I have no clue how anyone could go on living their life after causing someone to almost kill themselves/legitimately consider it. Imagine the weight on your shoulders knowing you made someone so lost, sad and depressed that they felt the only way to escape was through killing themselves.

Imagine the weight on your shoulders knowing you made someone so lost, sad and depressed that they felt the only way to escape was through killing themselves.

reply_to.body: In Skype there's a block function or on any social media for that matter. In TS there is also a mute button.
reply_to.body_tagged: In Skype there's a block function or on any social media for that matter. In TS there is also a mute button.

replies.body:
Anyone can report not just you. If they were smart they wouldn't give out their info, or Skype. There also is an option of blocking contacts. As for Team Speak the player can report, use the mute button or leave if it gets too harsh.

And Shadow you wouldn't get hate if you are doing the right thing, in the future contact Sr Mods+ Or the support emails if you have any problems

replies.body: Even if you block them, this still doesn't make it go away, it doesn't make it stop, it's just hiding from the issue and not confronting it. Only making it worse. People will find out, and I will get hate, don't pretend like it won't happen, because it will, and a lot of the time this goes around and isn't dealt with anyways.

replies.body:
Whether you report the player or not, they probably already know because of this thread.
Which would you rather.
Having someone bug you because you reported them
Or
This cyberbullying persisting and the player in question committing something as drastic as suicide
You can do the right thing.

You can do the right thing.

replies.body:
I understand that cyber-bullying is an issue, but this thread went out of hand way too fast and this is completely unnecessary.  If you want to deal with someone who is being so rude, we created a way to report for a reason.  Please refrain from making threads such as this.

Locking...
replies.body_tagged:
I understand that cyber-bullying is an issue, but this thread went out of hand way too fast and this is completely unnecessary.  If you want to deal with someone who is being so rude, we created a way to report for a reason.  Please refrain from making threads such as this.

Locking...
